short_description: This function gathers the statistic of the input.
long_description: This function gathers the statistic of the input.  It collects min, max, count, sum and squaresum.

input_tables.name: input
input_tables.rDescription: The input dataset for scale function.
input_tables.description: The input dataset for scale function.

argument_clauses.name: InputColumns
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies the input table columns that contain the attribute values of the samples. The attribute values must be numeric values between -1e308 and 1e308. If a value is outside this range, the function treats it as infinity.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies the input table columns that contain the attribute values of the samples. The attribute values must be numeric values between -1e308 and 1e308. If a value is outside this range, the function treats it as infinity.

argument_clauses.name: MissValue
argument_clauses.rDescription: Specifies how the ta.scale, ta.scalemap, and ta.partitionscale functions are to process NULL values in input, as follows:KEEP (default): Keep NULL values, OMIT: Ignore any row that has a NULL value, ZERO: Replace each NULL value with zero, LOCATION: Replace each NULL value with its location value.
argument_clauses.description: Specifies how the Scale, ScaleMap, and PartitionScale functions are to process NULL values in input, as follows:KEEP (default): Keep NULL values, OMIT: Ignore any row that has a NULL value, ZERO: Replace each NULL value with zero, LOCATION: Replace each NULL value with its location value.
